Class OverapproximatePN

    • Method Detail

      • overapproximate

        public static PetriNet overapproximate(TransitionSystem ts,
                                       PNProperties properties)
                                throws MissingLocationException,
                                       UnsupportedPNPropertiesException
        Calculate the minimal Petri Net over-approximation of a transition system.
        Parameters:
        ts - The transition system to over-approximate.
        properties - The properties that the resulting Petri net should satisfy.
        Returns:
        A Petri net being a minimal over-approximation of the input.
        Throws:
        MissingLocationException - If some states of the input have a location and others do not.
        UnsupportedPNPropertiesException - If overapproximation is not possible for the given input.

      • handleSeparationFailures

        public static TransitionSystem handleSeparationFailures(TransitionSystem ts,
                                                        java.util.Collection<java.util.Set<State>> failedSSP,
                                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<State>> failedESSP)
        Create a new transition system from the given system that will not have the given separation failures.
        Parameters:
        ts - The transition system whose synthesis was attempted.
        failedSSP - A collection of sets of unseparable states.
        failedESSP - A description of event/state separation failures.
        Returns:
        A transition system without the given separation failures.
